sentences.en: After parting from Philpot, the poor wretch had managed to walk all right for some distance.
sentences.cn: 这个可怜的家伙跟菲尔波特分手后勉强走了一段路.

sentences.en: Before the poor wretch had time to speak, he was shot.
sentences.cn: 这个可怜的人还没来得及开口就中了枪。

sentences.en: He called me an ungrateful wretch and nourished the grievance to the end of his days.
sentences.cn: 他说我是个忘恩负义的无耻小人,直到死的时候他还是心怀不满.

sentences.en: He was a lonely, miserable wretch.
sentences.cn: 他是一个孤独的可怜虫。

sentences.en: I felt disgusted at the little wretch's composure.
sentences.cn: 我对于这个小可怜虫的坦然态度极感厌恶.

sentences.en: Now what a wretch must he be!
Oh, what have you done, you wretch!
sentences.cn: 噢，你都干了些什么，你这个混蛋！

sentences.en: The Author of our religion everywhere professes himself the wretch's friend.
sentences.cn: 我们宗教之主到处都说过,他是世上可怜人的真朋友.

sentences.en: The little wretch is only nineteen.
sentences.cn: 那个小坏蛋还只有十九岁.

sentences.en: The miserable wretch lost his all.
sentences.cn: 这个贱骨头失去了他的一切.

sentences.en: Tom was touched, for he knew by his own experience how this wretch had suffered.
sentences.cn: 汤姆心里很难受, 因为他根据自己亲身的经验,知道这个倒霉蛋吃了多大的苦头.

sentences.en: What would she do about that ? The confounded wretch!
sentences.cn: 这样一来,她会采取什么步骤呢?

sentences.en: Where have you been. wretch? Here is Jerry fou you.
sentences.cn: 小坏蛋,你跑到哪里去了? 杰瑞为了你大哭不止.

sentences.en: You are really an ungrateful wretch to complain instead of thanking him.
sentences.cn: 你不但不谢他,还埋怨他,真不知好歹.

words.tran_cn: 可怜的；卑鄙的；令人苦恼或难受的

trans.tran_cn: 不幸的人，可怜的人，恶棍，坏蛋
trans.tran_en: someone that you feel sorry for
